category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Enable automatic deletion of unconfirmed users
If this option is enabled, unconfirmed users will be automatically deleted after the specified number of days.
Days until unconfirmed users are deleted
Number of days after which unconfirmed users are automatically deleted.
Defines the maximum number of users that can be deleted per cron job execution to reduce server load.
If this option is enabled, administrators will be notified via email when unconfirmed users are automatically deleted.

category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: Can view log of automatic deletion of unconfirmed users (email confirmation)
Allows viewing the log of automatically deleted unconfirmed users (email confirmation) in the ACP.
